org.springframework.data.redis.connection.lettuce

接口 LettucePoolingClientConfiguration

  • 所有超级接口:
    LettuceClientConfiguration

    public interface LettucePoolingClientConfiguration
extends LettuceClientConfiguration
    Redis client configuration for lettuce using a driver level pooled connection by adding pooling specific configuration to LettuceClientConfiguration.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder 
      static class  LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingSslClientConfigurationBuilder 

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.springframework.data.redis.connection.lettuce.LettuceClientConfiguration

        LettuceClientConfiguration.LettuceClientConfigurationBuilder, LettuceClientConfiguration.LettuceSslClientConfigurationBuilder

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder builder()
      Creates a new LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder to build LettucePoolingClientConfiguration to be used with the Lettuce client.
      static LettucePoolingClientConfiguration defaultConfiguration()
      Creates a default LettucePoolingClientConfiguration with SSL no Peer Verification yes Start TLS no Client Options none Client Resources none Connect Timeout 60 Seconds Shutdown Timeout 100 Milliseconds pool config default GenericObjectPoolConfig
      org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericObjectPoolConfig getPoolConfig() 

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.redis.connection.lettuce.LettuceClientConfiguration

        getClientOptions, getClientResources, getCommandTimeout, getShutdownTimeout, isStartTls, isUseSsl, isVerifyPeer

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPoolConfig

        org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericObjectPoolConfig getPoolConfig()
        返回:
        the GenericObjectPoolConfig. Never null.

      • builder

        static LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder builder()
        Creates a new LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder to build LettucePoolingClientConfiguration to be used with the Lettuce client.
        指定者:
        builder 在接口中 LettuceClientConfiguration
        返回:
        a new LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.LettucePoolingClientConfigurationBuilder to build LettucePoolingClientConfiguration.

      • defaultConfiguration

        static LettucePoolingClientConfiguration defaultConfiguration()
        Creates a default LettucePoolingClientConfiguration with
        SSL
        no
        Peer Verification
        yes
        Start TLS
        no
        Client Options
        none
        Client Resources
        none
        Connect Timeout
        60 Seconds
        Shutdown Timeout
        100 Milliseconds
        pool config
        default GenericObjectPoolConfig
        指定者:
        defaultConfiguration 在接口中 LettuceClientConfiguration
        返回:
        a LettucePoolingClientConfiguration with defaults.
